description: Design, implementation & presentation of a research project with emphasis on defining the research issue, establishing methodology, undertaking appropriate analysis of data & drawing defensible conclusion. Students completing the course in one semester must enrol in AGRC7611. Students commencing in sem 1 must enrol in AGRC7612 for both sem 1 & 2. Students commencing in sem 2 must enrol in AGRC7613 in sem 2 and AGRC7613 in sem 1 of the following year.
